definition.content:
[Vanta](https://www.vanta.com/) is a compliance automation tool that assists businesses in obtaining security certifications and identifying vulnerabilities. It streamlines compliance processes through automation, making monitoring and documentation easier to establish solid security practices.

This dashboard offers insights into different framework analytics such as completed controls, passing documents, and successful tests.

**Note**:
- The dashboard widgets display the latest analytics collected for the frameworks.

**Tip:**
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.


For more information, see the [Vanta Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/vanta/).
